title: CSPC urges Americans to STOP using Onewheels due to consumer deaths: RIP onewheel?
description:
👉 Rossmann chat - send Louis a letter: https://tinyurl.com/writetolouis
👉 CSPC announcement: https://www.cpsc.gov/Newsroom/News-Releases/2023/CPSC-Warns-Consumers-to-Stop-Using-Onewheel-Self-Balancing-Electric-Skateboards-Due-to-Ejection-Hazard-At-Least-Four-Deaths-and-Multiple-Injuries-Reported

👉 Video citations:
🔵 Onewheel battery issue: https://youtu.be/KGzDCnjgUbc
🔵 Why I think Future Motion sucks: https://youtu.be/6G3ddOMvBws

👉 Equipment used:

00:00 - Intro
00:16 - Onewheel 
00:26 - Newest onewheel bricks when servicing battery
00:47 - Why people wish to fix their onewheel outside the manufacturer
01:01 - Their argument is SAFETY
01:09 - Why it's BS
01:39 - Ghosting
01:58 - Consumer Product Safety Commission urges people to stop using onewheels
02:31 - What the government gets wrong
02:44 - The GT is the only one this should be happening to
02:52 - Older onewheel models do not have this problem to the degree the GT does. 
03:10 - Future Motion's virtue signalling was their downfall
03:30 - Pure speculation
04:04 - Summary
04:38 - Hopefully a lesson was learned here(but probably not)
05:13 - The lesson
05:35 - Why every onewheel was recalled instead of just the GT
05:59 - This is a loss for EVERYONE!
06:11 - Older onewheels are safe! 
06:27 - How Future Motion's greed will screw the entire PEV community
07:10 - What they feared, they created
08:00 - Mini-tour

title: Apple SUED for privacy violations; iOS collects invasive analytics even if you opt out.
description:
👉 Rossmann chat - send Louis a letter: https://tinyurl.com/writetolouis

👉 AMAZING @Mysk_co Twitter thread: https://twitter.com/mysk_co/status/1588308341780262912
👉 Privacy study on android vs iOS: https://digitalcontentnext.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/DCN-Google-Data-Collection-Paper.pdf

00:00 Intro
00:16 Apology
00:56 Apple sued for deceiving users w/ privacy settings
01:12 Every tap made in the app store in iOS 14.6 sent to Apple
01:27 Which apps viewed with timestamps & duration sent to Apple
01:40 iPhones don't allow you to install apps ANY OTHER WAY!!
02:06 Why should app viewing history be sent to Apple?
02:16 Switching personalization off did NOT reduce amount of data app sent!
02:42 Stocks & news app sends stocks watched, news read to Apple 
03:06 iOS behaves worse than Google Chrome
03:40 Apple's definition of privacy is manipulative & dystopian 
04:25 iOS still sends less data than stock android
05:18 Shilling of GrapheneOS (not sponsored, not paid to, it just kicks ass)
06:06 The illusion of choice with the mobile duopoly
06:40 Privacy is not by default without modification 
07:21 Every time I say something nice about Apple, I get proven wrong :(
08:27 - THE UNBLOCKABLE SPONSOR

00:00 Intro
00:20 How I use twitter
00:49 Elon Musk tweet
01:00 What is an appropriate public response?
01:09 You can't talk to the boss like that!!
01:19 Who sets the work culture?
01:27 The three degrees of public
01:40 An example with my own staff
02:07 Setting work culture happens at the top
03:10 Employee response - very technically relevant & literate
03:44 SURPRISE DGG? b
04:00 This employee wants to make things better
04:50 FIRED!
05:00 What would you do, Louis??
06:03 Addressing the stans
06:12 The stan rule
06:20 You can't criticize Musk unless you have his money or businesses. 
06:49 Billionaires are mortal, and human
07:14 Elon's own words, he is overworked and burning out
07:43 I'd screw up doing 100 hours of work a week as well
08:22 If this crashes and burns, I'll still be happy. twitter sucks.
